## Mission

Integrate OpenAI for intelligent contract analysis and recommendations.

## Branch

`claude/wave6/ai-integration`

## Scope

- OpenAI API integration
- Contract summarization
- Opportunity matching
- Risk assessment

## Features

1. AI contract summary
2. Opportunity fit scoring
3. Risk identification
4. Proposal suggestions
